title: Drawing, "Design for Side Panels of a Coach", 1754
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash, yellow watercolor, charcoal on white laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pencil lower right "Charles Crace 1754."
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Rocaille design for coach panels.  Upper and lower left corners have advertisements for coach painting attached.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Side Panels of a Coach", 1754.
1754. Pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash, yellow watercolor, charcoal on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1948-40-185.
